title: SerensSoulYoga
features: Users can register as an instructor or student
Instructors can add and update classes based on feedback
Admin can manage user roles and approve/deny classes
objective: SerensSoulYoga Full-stack web app for yoga classes. Users can register as instructors/students, buy classes, and admins manage content.

title: BabyCarCurias
features: User authentication with email & password and Google
Users can add and update content
Collaboration features and access to view all details
objective: BabyCarCurias is a full-stack web app for the baby market. Features include user authentication, content management, collaboration, and Firebase integration.

title: Top Muster Chef
features: User authentication with email & password and Google GitHub
View details page of top chefs for logged-in users
View blogs and download PDF versions
objective: TopMusterChef: User authentication, top chefs, blogs, and PDF downloads in a full-stack web app with React, Node.js, MongoDB, Firebase.
